reference.title: Java topic types
reference.shortdesc: The Java API specialization provides a set of specific topic types that can describe a Java application programming interface (API) library. The Java language-specific API topic types are specialized from the generic API reference topic types. This specialization permits the sharing of the basic semantics and processing.

section.title: Description
section.p: The Java modules describe the Java topic types and their contained elements. For example, the javaPackage module describes all the elements necessary to describe a Java API package. The Java topic types provide language-specific topic types for documenting Java API references.
